hh3cDhcpSnoop2.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2

revisions.description: The private MIB file includes the DHCP Snooping profile.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085

hh3cDhcpSnoop2Enabled.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2Enabled
hh3cDhcpSnoop2Enabled.description: If the value of this object is set to 'true', DHCP snooping is enabled.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindDbName.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindDbName
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindDbName.description: Name of the file that used to store binding information. If the value of the object is set to a zero-length string, the configuration will be removed.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRefreshIntvl.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRefreshIntvl
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRefreshIntvl.description: The refresh interval of the binding information in seconds.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRefresh.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRefresh
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRefresh.description: If the value of this object is set to 'on', the binding information will be refreshed immediately.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktSentNum.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktSentNum
hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktSentNum.description: The total number of the packets send by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktRcvNum.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktRcvNum
hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktRcvNum.description: The total number of the packets received by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktDropNum.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktDropNum
hh3cDhcpSnoop2PktDropNum.description: The total number of the packets dropped by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindTable
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindTable.description: The table containing information of DHCP clients listened by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindEntry.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindEntry
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindEntry.description: An entry containing information of DHCP clients.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindIpAddr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindIpAddr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindIpAddr.description: DHCP client's IP addresses collected by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindVlanId.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindVlanId
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindVlanId.description: DHCP client's VLAN ID collected by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindSecVlanId.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindSecVlanId
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindSecVlanId.description: DHCP client's second VLAN ID collected by DHCP snooping. 65535 means no second VLAN.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindMacAddr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindMacAddr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindMacAddr.description: DHCP client's MAC address collected by DHCP snooping.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindLease.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindLease
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindLease.description: Left lease time in seconds collected by DHCP snooping. The value of this object cannot be 0.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindPortIndex.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindPortIndex
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindPortIndex.description: DHCP client's port index collected by DHCP snooping. The value of zero means unknown port.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRowStatus.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRowStatus
hh3cDhcpSnoop2BindRowStatus.description: RowStatus. Only destroy action is allow to use.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfConfigTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfConfigTable
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfConfigTable.description: A table is used to configure DHCP snooping functions on ports.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfConfigEntry.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfConfigEntry
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfConfigEntry.description: An entry containing DHCP snooping configurations of ports.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfCheckMac.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfCheckMac
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfCheckMac.description: If the value is 'true', MAC address of DHCP packets received on the port will be checked.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfCheckRequest.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfCheckRequest
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfCheckRequest.description: If the value is 'true', DHCP request packets will be checked.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfRateLimit.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfRateLimit
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfRateLimit.description: The rate limit in Kbps. If the value is 0, there is no rate limit on the port.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfRecordBind.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfRecordBind
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfRecordBind.description: If the value is 'true', information of DHCP packets received on the port will be recorded.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfMaxLearnNum.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfMaxLearnNum
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfMaxLearnNum.description: The maximum number of binding entries that could be learned on the port. If the value is 0, it means that there is no threshold on the port.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82Enable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82Enable
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82Enable.description: If DHCP snooping supports option 82 functions, the value is 'true'. If DHCP snooping does NOT support option 82 functions, the value is 'false'.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82Strategy.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82Strategy
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82Strategy.description: The strategy of DHCP snooping handling option 82. 'drop' indicates DHCP snooping discarding the request packet including option 82. 'keep' indicates DHCP snooping accepting the request packet without any change of the option 82. 'replace' indicates DHCP snooping accepting the request packet on condition that it generates a new option 82 to replace the original one.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode.description: The mode of filling in the circuit ID suboption of DHCP option 82. 'normal' is the standard mode. 'verbose' is the detailed mode. 'userDefine' is the user-defined mode. If the value of this object is set to 'userDefine', hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDStr must also be set.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeType.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeType
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeType.description: Type of access node identifier that is used to fill in the circuit ID suboption of option 82 when the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOption82CIDMode is set to 'verbose'. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode. 'invalid' indicates that the node identifier is NOT used to fill in the circuit ID suboption of option 82. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is NOT 'verbose', the value of this object is set to 'invalid' automatically. Otherwise the value of this object cannot be set to 'invalid'. 'mac' indicates that the node identifier is filled in with the bridge MAC of DHCP snooping device. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is set to 'verbose', the default value of this object is 'mac'. 'sysname' indicates that the node identifier is filled in with the sysname of the DHCP snooping. 'userDefine' indicates the node identifier is filled in with the string defined by the object of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeStr. If the value is set to 'userDefine', the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeStr must also be set to a non-zero length string.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeStr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeStr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeStr.description: The string defined by user to fill in the node identifier in the verbose mode. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is NOT 'verbose', or the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeType is NOT 'userDefine', it is set to a zero-length string automatically. Otherwise it must be set to a non-zero length string. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode and hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDNodeType.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDStr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDStr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDStr.description: The string defined by user to fill in the circuit ID suboption of option 82 in the user-define mode. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is NOT 'userDefine', it is set to a zero-length string automatically. Otherwise it must be set to a non-zero length string. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDFormat.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDFormat
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDFormat.description: The format of the circuit ID suboption of DHCP option 82. 'hex' is the hex format. 'ascii' is the ascii format. 'undefine' is the undefine format. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is 'normal', this object is set with 'hex' automatically and cannot be set with 'undefine'. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is 'verbose', the default value of this object is 'undefine'. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode is 'userDefine', this object is set with 'ascii' automatically and cannot be set with other value. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82CIDMode.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode.description: The mode of filling in the remote ID suboption of DHCP option 82. 'normal' is the standard mode. 'userDefine' is the user-defined mode. 'sysname' is the sysname mode. If the value of this object is set to 'userDefine', hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDStr must also be set.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDStr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDStr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDStr.description: The string defined by user to fill in the remote ID in the user-defined mode. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode is NOT 'userDefine', this object is set with a zero-length string automatically. Otherwise it must be set with a non-zero length string. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDFormat.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDFormat
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDFormat.description: The format of DHCP option 82 remote ID in 'normal' mode. 'hex' is the hex format. 'ascii' is the ascii format. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode is 'sysname' or 'userDefine', this object is set with 'ascii' automatically and cannot be set with other value. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode is 'normal', the default value of this object is 'hex'. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfOpt82RIDMode.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDTable
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDTable.description: A table containing the information of the circuit ID suboption of DHCP option 82 in VLAN.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDEntry.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDEntry
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDEntry.description: An entry containing the information of the circuit ID suboption of DHCP option 82 in VLAN.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDStr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDStr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDStr.description: The string defined by user to fill in the circuit ID suboption of option 82.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDRowStatus.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDRowStatus
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanCIDRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDTable.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDTable
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDTable.description: A table containing the information of the remote ID suboption of DHCP option 82 in VLAN.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDEntry.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDEntry
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDEntry.description: An entry containing the information of the remote ID suboption of DHCP option 82 in VLAN.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDMode.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDMode
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDMode.description: The mode of filling in the remote ID suboption of DHCP option 82 in VLAN. 'sysname' indicates using the device sysname to fill in the suboption. 'userDefine' indicates using the string defined by hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDStr to fill in the suboption. If the value of this object is set to 'userDefine', hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDStr must also be set.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDStr.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDStr
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDStr.description: The string used to fill in the remote ID suboption. If the value of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDMode is NOT 'userDefine', this object is set with a zero-length string automatically. Otherwise it must be set with a non-zero length string. The SET operation of this object must be with the SET operation of hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDMode.

hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDRowStatus.name: hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDRowStatus
hh3cDhcpSnoop2IfVlanRIDRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy.
